{{Description|A pair of mysterious puppets lost in the endless process of honing their combat skills finally meet a fearless wanderer in the depths of the world.<br />Their mechanical bodies and hearts may keep them alive for a thousand years or more, but how many worthy foes can they meet in that time, and how many legendary battles will they fight?}}
The '''Dual Maguu Kenki: Lone Gale and Galloping Frost''' is a special event boss appearing in the event [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword]]. While the fight consists of two bosses, a third boss, '''Maguu Kenki: Mask of Terror''' sometimes joins their ranks.

*{{Enemy|Maguu Kenki: Lone Gale}}
*{{Enemy|Maguu Kenki: Galloping Frost}}
*{{Enemy|Maguu Kenki: Mask of Terror}}

They appears in the following challenges where the bosses can gain a [[Curious Vitality]] [[Aura]] depending on the player's settings.:
* [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword/Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence#Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence I|Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence I]]
* [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword/Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence#Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence II|Battlesong: Ingenious Impermanence II]]
* [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword/Wanderer's Threefold Challenge|Wanderer's Threefold Challenge]].

The three Maguu Kenki also returned in the [[Spiral Abyss/Floors/2021-12-01|Version 2.3]] and [[Spiral Abyss/Floors/2023-02-01|Version 3.4]] [[Spiral Abyss]].
